content.question: The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 to the power of open parentheses 3 x close parentheses end exponent"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>. Which of the following statements describes characteristics of the graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane?

choices.label: The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a vertical dilation of <math alttext="y equals 2 to the power of x"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>, and <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="8 to the power of x"><msup><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>.

The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a vertical dilation of <math alttext="y equals 2 to the power of x"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>, and <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="8 times 2 to the power of x"><mn>8</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>.

The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a horizontal dilation of <math alttext="y equals 2 to the power of x"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>, and <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="8 to the power of x"><msup><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>.

The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a horizontal dilation of <math alttext="y equals 2 to the power of x"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>, and <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="8 times 2 to the power of x"><mn>8</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>.

content.answer: The graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is a horizontal dilation of <math alttext="y equals 2 to the power of x"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>, and <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="8 to the power of x"><msup><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
